about_the_game:
The Ghost - Task of the Ghost Hunters is a single player game. Your task is to find the ghosts and solve puzzles. Puzzles will be an important part of The Ghost - Task of the Ghost Hunters game. There will be multiple levels and the levels will also be of different sizes. There will be small houses to larger multi-storey houses, which also leads to several puzzles to be solved.

auxiliary tools

You have three tools at your disposal in the level. Use the tools properly to identify the right spirit.


  • Level: There is only one level available
  • There are only two ghosts
  • You have three tools at your disposal to identify the right spirit
